Tabs

You also enabled tabs by uncommenting those lines in config/application.coffee.

We've also enabled the tab bar: the Welcome tab shows our previous www/index.html document, and the Internet tab shows Google's front page.

Localhost

In addition, this page is served from http://localhost (instead of via the file:// protocol), which is part of our secret sauce. You can still use file:// protocol (that allows easy cross-domain AJAX) by just specifying the file without the http://localhost prefix.

One instant benefit of localhost is that if you look at the app/views/layouts/application.html file, you'll notice that we don't have to use explicit relative paths. You can always use /stylesheets/applcation.css instead of ../../stylesheets/application.css. The same applies for images etc.
